column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We all got a 6-10 oz. filet - and they were very good. Cooked to perfection (medium is the only way
column2: grow up if you order your steak any more cooked)
column3: and while they say a good steak shouldn't need any sauce
column4: I did find the creamy sauce they provided very tasty. It didn't ruin the integrity of my steak.
